About

 

Nicole Heath RYT-500, completed her 200 yoga teacher training in November 2012 at ShivaShakti School of Yoga in Rockland, Maine, and completed her 300 hour Advanced Yoga Teacher through ShivaShakti School of Yoga in June 2016. She is registered with Yoga Alliance, having met their requirements.
